mapper.sql: ID, DMB_MODEL_UID, DMB_COLOR_MODEL_UID, DMB_CREATOR, DMB_CREATE_DATE, DMB_UPDATER, DMB_UPDATE_DATE, DMB_PROJECT_UID, DMB_MODEL_FEATURE_UID, DMB_RESERVED_2, DMB_RESERVED_3, DMB_RESERVED_4, DMB_RESERVED_5, DMB_SPECIAL_FEATURE_UID, DMB_STATUS
mapper.select: select t.ID, t.DMB_MODEL_UID, t.DMB_COLOR_MODEL_UID, t.DMB_CREATOR, t.DMB_CREATE_DATE, t.DMB_UPDATER, t.DMB_UPDATE_DATE, t.DMB_PROJECT_UID, t.DMB_MODEL_FEATURE_UID, t.DMB_RESERVED_2, t.DMB_RESERVED_3, t.DMB_RESERVED_4, t.DMB_RESERVED_5, t.DMB_SPECIAL_FEATURE_UID, t.DMB_STATUS, t2.CHANGE_NO as CHANGE_ORDER_NO from HZ_DERIVATIVE_MATERIEL_BASIC t left join HZ_CHANGE_ORDER_RECORD t2 on t2.ID = t.CHANGE_ORDER_UID where DMB_PROJECT_UID = #{basic.dmbProjectUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by t.id
mapper.insert:

mapper.update:
update HZ_DERIVATIVE_MATERIEL_BASIC
DMB_MODEL_UID = #{dmbModelUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DMB_COLOR_MODEL_UID = #{dmbColorModelUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DMB_CREATOR = #{dmbCreator,jdbcType=OTHER},
DMB_CREATE_DATE = #{dmbCreateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DMB_UPDATER = #{dmbUpdater,jdbcType=OTHER},
DMB_UPDATE_DATE = sysdate,
DMB_MODEL_FEATURE_UID = #{dmbModelFeatureUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DMB_RESERVED_2 = #{dmbReserved2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DMB_RESERVED_3 = #{dmbReserved3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DMB_RESERVED_4 = #{dmbReserved4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DMB_RESERVED_5 = #{dmbReserved5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DMB_SPECIAL_FEATURE_UID = #{dmbSpecialFeatureUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DMB_STATUS = #{dmbStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update HZ_DERIVATIVE_MATERIEL_BASIC set DMB_MODEL_UID = #{dmbModelUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DMB_COLOR_MODEL_UID = #{dmbColorModelUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DMB_CREATOR = #{dmbCreator,jdbcType=OTHER}, DMB_CREATE_DATE = #{dmbCreateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DMB_UPDATER = #{dmbUpdater,jdbcType=OTHER}, DMB_UPDATE_DATE = sysdate, DMB_MODEL_FEATURE_UID = #{dmbModelFeatureUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DMB_RESERVED_2 = #{dmbReserved2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DMB_RESERVED_3 = #{dmbReserved3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DMB_RESERVED_4 = #{dmbReserved4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DMB_RESERVED_5 = #{dmbReserved5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DMB_SPECIAL_FEATURE_UID = #{dmbSpecialFeatureUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} DMB_STATUS = #{dmbStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update.foreach: update HZ_DERIVATIVE_MATERIEL_BASIC set DMB_MODEL_UID = #{hzDerivativeMaterielBasics.dmbModelUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DMB_COLOR_MODEL_UID = #{hzDerivativeMaterielBasics.dmbColorModelUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DMB_MODEL_FEATURE_UID = #{hzDerivativeMaterielBasics.dmbModelFeatureUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DMB_SPECIAL_FEATURE_UID = #{hzDerivativeMaterielBasics.dmbSpecialFeatureUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DMB_STATUS = #{hzDerivativeMaterielBasics.dmbStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{hzDerivativeMaterielBasics.id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
